TitleEnglish: Mobile Suit Gundam AGE: Memory of Eden
SummaryEnglish: Two fates that never should have crossed paths... Asemu Asuno, son of the Earth Federation Forces commander Flit Asuno. Zeheart Galette, a warrior who throws himself into battle for the sake of the Vagan people. For a brief while they spent time together, formed a friendship, and sometimes quarreled, even as they looked up at the same cosmos. But the time has come for a bitter parting.

1.SummaryEnglish: Episode 01 of Mobile Suit Gundam AGE: Memory of Eden OVA.

2.SummaryEnglish: Episode 02 of Mobile Suit Gundam AGE: Memory of Eden OVA.
